title: I was Permenantly Banned, Please Unban me.
body:
I've had this account for years, I've spent so much money on it and i JUST got gold V, just before the Pre-Season, I worked so hard!

I just bought RP for my friends!

I went on a crazy winstreak just to do it.

I was toxic sometimes I admit, but people are toxic and cruel on this game, It hurts, I was pain, taking that type of stuff really hurts your mental and emotional state without saying anything back.

I'm not the kind of toxic that shouts at my team or the enemy.

Can't you just permenantly mute me and I can whisper me friends? One guy said "Wish I could turn back time so your parents never birthed you" like what kind of disgusting toxicity is that?

ALl i do is yell how "this is bullshit" "this sucks" "god damn this game needs fucking balanced" thats not toxic and its not flaming another person, its just yelling out my frustrations, you can see the damn chat logs! So there is swearing in it, but the system is automatic its not actually at anyone.

Come on, a PERMENANT ban, really? I can't make another account, I've gotten so much on this account, I've got a variety of different and weird runes for different things, I think I've put like 500 pounds into this account.

Can you please just Unban and either permenantly mute my or I'll just never speak again? I dont ever attack people, I just yell out my frustrations or defend myself against people being disgustingly cruel, rubbing it in my face and kicking me when I'm down when they are already winning, Thats sadistic and cruel! I'm NEVER like that, infact if you look at my chat logs about 25 games ago.

Our ezreal said "Ez" when we won and I said "Shut up, it wasn't easy, well played" Like thats how I am, I constantly work to not be an asshole on this game.

I may have been toxic lately but I was just getting frustrated with a new build that was working then wasn't.

when I lose myself I usually just yell how everything is bullshit, I'm not flaming other people, thats just yelling itself, directed at no-one, but the enemy team and my team seem to feel its directed at them.

Never intentionally fed, just yelled, never afked unless i got dc'd or something come on!

I've not got much in my life, and I finally got damn gold V just yesterday!

If the system can't pick up the difference between yelling and harrassing other people I won't speak again, I'll just mute everyone and have to do with pings from now on, but god damn I don't deserve a permenant ban, PLEASE!

I can't believe this has happened, this is so unjust, I'm not the problem in this community, Just tell me what I need to do to be unbanned.

PS: Also can you tell me where you sent the e-mail, I can't remember the account I used to make this league account =<

replies.body:
There are 4 tiers of punishment which you must work through to get a permaban, unless the offenses were so severe as to warrant skipping steps. Did you already go past chat restrictions and a 14 day ban before this?

About the email, you can see what email is verified by clicking on your profile on the top right of this page and going to **Settings**. If you never verified it you need to submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for account recovery if you are unable to do so and need to contact Riot or make changes.

> [{quoted}](name=Deep Terror Nami,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1dJz3Gd5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-04T19:32:02.981+0000)
>
> There are 4 tiers of punishment which you must work through to get a permaban, unless the offenses were so severe as to warrant skipping steps. Did you already go past chat restrictions and a 14 day ban before this?
> 
> About the email, you can see what email is verified by clicking on your profile on the top right of this page and going to **Settings**. If you never verified it you need to submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for account recovery if you are unable to do so and need to contact Riot or make changes.

Yeah I got past the 14 day one, after that I knew it was serious and I stayed completely silent, not speaking one word for like 35-50 games, like you'd think they'd recognise that.

Honestly though, those games were pretty torturous, taking such crap from people, but yes it be nice if they'd recognise that instead of the few games I lost my cool when everyone was blaming me for not helping with ganks on bloody kassadin at level 5 for god sakes, he isn't really even able to reliably fight till level 11 odds, if you farm well.

Ok it gave me chat logs when I logged in, its a little bad but its not bloody that bad, its a shame It doesn't show you context with what the other people say, but I remember some of it from the recent game.

DaedricTerror13: It's ok I got jungle singed     (can solo jungle as aatrox)
DaedricTerror13: Singed wtf
DaedricTerror13: U never seen illaoi before? (apparently he actually hadn't)
DaedricTerror13: oh really?
DaedricTerror13: Well when she takes your soul
DaedricTerror13: She spawns tentacles around u
DaedricTerror13: So you can't just back
DaedricTerror13: U gotta keep running
DaedricTerror13: damnit
DaedricTerror13: Wasted a lot of running around trying to save ekko lol  (I'm not berating ekko here, just making conversation, he actually got zyra two kills in literally the first minute of the game.)

DaedricTerror13: need to jungle
DaedricTerror13: wtf
DaedricTerror13: why did that atuo
DaedricTerror13: Are you kidding me?  (just yelling in general at not getting a kill, not at anyone)
DaedricTerror13: Fucking kicked into a trap?  (lee ulted me and I unluckily got kicked into a cait trap just a fluke)
DaedricTerror13: Fucking lol mate god damnit!   (still not shouting at anyone, just shouting in general)
DaedricTerror13: Because you pinged me!  (someone pinged to go in for a gank and asked me after why I went in, that was the lee kick trap bit)

DaedricTerror13: Imma just play
DaedricTerror13: WTF
DaedricTerror13: damn lee
DaedricTerror13: surviving
DaedricTerror13: seriously!?   (just complaining about the famous 1% hp, not yelling at anyone, just venting my frustrations, been called a flamer up until awhile about 4 mins ago now, seem like flaming to you?)

DaedricTerror13: Singed is feeding tbh
DaedricTerror13: whys he building ap......come on......
DaedricTerror13: singed ur menant (meant) to build tanky (he seemed new, told me this was his promos, which was odd cause it was a gold ranked game)

DaedricTerror13: we are all fine except him
DaedricTerror13: just relax
DaedricTerror13: we got it
DaedricTerror13: fucking warded!
DaedricTerror13: poor zyra man
DaedricTerror13: played so well   (I actually meant this, she still died but dodged like 4 skill shots vs like a full team, it was some seriously godly play)

DaedricTerror13: blame me lol?     (She started lashing out at me now, because I think she thought I berating her but I was serious)
DaedricTerror13: u already got 2 kills early  
DaedricTerror13: wtf
DaedricTerror13: REAL EARLY (the 2 kills ekko got ultra early the zyra support got)
DaedricTerror13: me?
DaedricTerror13: or who?
DaedricTerror13: wjre l  (meant to "what" i think because illaoi disappeared or so I thought)
DaedricTerror13: oh shes dead?
DaedricTerror13: ur poison    (singed asked how, was his poison)
DaedricTerror13: I guess
DaedricTerror13: wwwwwwwhhhhhhhhhyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy
DaedricTerror13: omfg
DaedricTerror13: wtf mate!   (again all just yelling)
DaedricTerror13: I got right out of her damn zone
DaedricTerror13: and the tentacles still hit me!
DaedricTerror13: listen singed
DaedricTerror13: im not going in, to save you anymor eok?  (ok)
DaedricTerror13: that was just fucking bad play  (talking about us both, him diving when we outnumbered and me following for the sake of helping a team mate, was stupid, especially as easily kited aatrox)

DaedricTerror13: im not suiciding fo ru (for u)
DaedricTerror13: should be 2/0 right now
DaedricTerror13: build tanky
DaedricTerror13: ...
DaedricTerror13: ur not meant to build ap.....
DaedricTerror13: how are you in gold?
DaedricTerror13: promos?  (he told me he was unranked)
DaedricTerror13: Isn't this a ranked game?
DaedricTerror13: I'm sure it is
DaedricTerror13: sry
DaedricTerror13: well build tanky!
DaedricTerror13: too many (ganked)
DaedricTerror13: damnit 
DaedricTerror13: didn't think we'd get that far
DaedricTerror13: with no resisitence  (resistence)
DaedricTerror13: damn fizz....
DaedricTerror13: COME ON
DaedricTerror13: JUST FUCKING LEAVE ME ALONE
DaedricTerror13: GOD DAMNIT GIMMI A BREAK!
DaedricTerror13: fucking trying to back and minions gotta show up in warded bush....
DaedricTerror13: omfg this is ridiculous    (again all just complaining, i'm actually trying to get my teammates to go like "yeah this fucking sucks huh?" so we can vent together, get some comraderie going, but apparently they think I'm flaming them?

DaedricTerror13: fucking 180 armor and lee is instaing me? the fuck is this
DaedricTerror13: HES NOT EVEN AD!
DaedricTerror13: stop taking farm plz   (support, if any other team member i wouldn't say that, as farm is fair game for everyone later game)

DaedricTerror13: LOL
DaedricTerror13: tank lee sin outdueling aatrox!
DaedricTerror13: BALANCED!   (still not shouting at anyone, just complaining)
DaedricTerror13: im not bloody flaming!  (and I wasn't! people are so used to flaming they think talking a lot is flaming, I just wanna fucking talk to people no friends IRL for god sakes!)

DaedricTerror13: im just talking
DaedricTerror13: who have I flaemd?  (flamed)
DaedricTerror13: You know what? Reported  (zyra giving me shit)
DaedricTerror13: HELP
DaedricTerror13: soo
DaedricTerror13: lol
DaedricTerror13: 3v2
DaedricTerror13: U guys run, really? *shrug* (I dived in to two enemies when we three and they ran, kinda pissed me off ill admit)
DaedricTerror13: but can't fight omega fed enemies
DaedricTerror13: report zyra for verbal abuse, feeding and now, afk.  (and she did go afk)
DaedricTerror13: she got two kills at like 3 mins (first blood too) and still failed and blamed us.
DaedricTerror13: wtf?
DaedricTerror13: for what?  (another team mate chimed in to say report me, probably thinking I'm flaming, when I'm just communicating a lot more than the regular lol player, probably because when you talk you get banned!)

DaedricTerror13: im not flaming anyone lol!
DaedricTerror13: im fucking talking a lot!
DaedricTerror13: yeah so "ez" ont  lieke I 1v2'd you earleir or anthing  (not/like/earlier/anything) (as a reponse to some asshole on the other team with the obnoxious "ez" when the game was god damn close)

And thats one game,  I'll put up the other with the context I remember from lee and fate too.

> DaedricTerror13: You know what? Reported (zyra giving me shit)
> DaedricTerror13: report zyra for verbal abuse, feeding and now, afk. (and she did go afk)


Asking for reports is a reportable offense in-and-of itself.  The system only needs one report to flag a game for review, so any additional reports are redundant.

Attempting to solicit reports against another player are just pointless harassment.

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1dJz3Gd5,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2016-11-04T20:46:31.942+0000)
>
> Asking for reports is a reportable offense in-and-of itself.  The system only needs one report to flag a game for review, so any additional reports are redundant.
> 
> Attempting to solicit reports against another player are just pointless harassment.

She was bloody doing it first about 6 minutes before! she was literally afk, blaming me for fucking complimenting her!

But ok, guess ur right.

A player being toxic does not justify you being toxic.

All that means is the remaining players in the game have to deal with two toxic player instead of one.

Just mute them (to spare yourself) and report them (to spare others).

> [{quoted}](name=EndlessSorcerer,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1dJz3Gd5,comment-id=0005000000000000,timestamp=2016-11-04T22:05:33.687+0000)
>
> A player being toxic does not justify you being toxic.
> 
> All that means is the remaining players in the game have to deal with two toxic player instead of one.
> 
> Just mute them (to spare yourself) and report them (to spare others).

Why? It's fucking bad for you to keep all that in, seriously take a read at this http://tinybuddha.com/blog/5-steps-to-let-go-of-anger-for-a-happier-life/   and cntrl + f  "But as a result of doing all the “right” things"

Says it all right there, all you do is bend backwards to ignore from all these people abusing you, and you finish the game and even if you win (which I did an actual 20 in a row lol, quite crazy) I still felt like shit because of the community, and thats why I ended up building up so much rage.

This crap clearly doesn't work, because there are still so many toxic players, infact it is every game 100% of the time without fail, they are just toxic in a way that is cold and sadistic, instead of firey and rageful, it attracts a lot less attention and so thats why everyone in the the gaming community has voted this game the worst community in the entire world.

ANd yet I'm to blame and I'm the one banned for not laying back and taking the mental abuse of this wretched community?

Muting does help, but if it starts before I do decide to mute them, I feel like I've let their ignorance win and let it go unchallenged.

I always tried to do more than just ignore people, but to calmly better the community, to reason with everyone and get everyone to be positive, but fucking  years of this community never ever playing ball, well lets just say most people would give up in 2 weeks, took me years to just start yelling back at them.

I'm just not the type of person that likes to ignore a problem, I'd rather fix the problem, with the whole community.

I'm not exactly "bending over backwards" to "ignore all the people abusing me". 

 I don't particular care about the opinions of random idiots on the internet who I will, most likely, never have to interact with again.

* I don't care about their opinion.
* I mute them so I don't have to hear their opinions
* I report them to spare others.

Honestly, sometimes I just laugh to myself about their abject stupidity and immaturity.  The fact that some players are that insecure and short-sighted can be rather amusing.
------------------
Sometimes, attempting to deescalate a fight or stop their toxicity can be worthwhile.

However, many toxic players just don't listen; all reacting to them does is give them what they want.

Over the years I've played this game, I've run into a lot of toxic players.  Many of them, I have found, stop behaving in a toxic manner when nobody acknowledges them (since they get no satisfaction from it).

I've honestly had player intentionally feed or troll in games, only to stop when they realize that everyone is just ignoring their existence.  In many of those cases, they just started playing normally against and we managed to win the game. 

 (Obviously, I still reported them for it afterwards, but wins are wins in ranked.)

Ignoring the blatant attempts to cover up infractions; Moderate toxicity at best, definitely not high.

Would not permaban.

You have to do a lot more than that to earn permban. Chances are it was utterly deserved and you should have taken note of earlier punishments and corrected your behavior. The fact you refused to learn or admit your mistakes means you are not needed in this community, more likely than not.

Logs or gtfo.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1dJz3Gd5,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-04T19:28:34.717+0000)
>
> You have to do a lot more than that to earn permban. Chances are it was utterly deserved and you should have taken note of earlier punishments and corrected your behavior. The fact you refused to learn or admit your mistakes means you are not needed in this community, more likely than not.
> 
> Logs or gtfo.

Dude the system is AUTOMATIC, if I swear over and over in no context, for example just say "fuck" that can be done by the players as "verbal abuse" and ull get seen for it.

As for chat logs, well there is a lot of games with a lot of different attitudes, but you'll see at bot i can't get the chat logs because I dunno what e-mail was sent to.

Either way, was I perfect? No, at least not in all my games, but when I was toxic always in context with someone attacking me first and these are few games compared to many, I actually went like bloody 35 games or something not talking at all, just holding my tongue, they could at least recognise that.

But seriously, I don't know why but when I get owned and say in /allchat  "this is fucking bullshit, there is too much cc in this game"  "god damnit 4 losses in a row, dunno why I can't get this to work again"

I always expect them to say something like "aw babe that sucks, yeah we all have bad games, the game can be kinda unbalanced at times, hey don't worry about it" THATS WHAT I ALWAYS DO!

But it's ALWAYS some god damn  "Lol salty, get good scrub, fucking noob just uninstall, stop flaming, not our fault your garbage" (even if I was ahead before no one sees reason in that and says something like "yeah you did good, too wreckless but when u got ahead" it's always some extremely obnoxious toxic bullshit.

It's enough to make the nicest person vile in this game, I was, but I've tried for years to be nice and genuine and reasonable with this community, I want to talk and communicate and argue in a healthy way, but it seems with this system it's just silence, or abuse people in a way where you can keep yourself under the radar, because defending yourself is out of the question.

Even if I just eventually say something like "Oh fuck off, gimmi a fucking break, I'm 4/3 and we are 7/21 as a team, wtf do you want from me!?" thats the type of shit thats considered toxic, after you are getting utterly verbally abused for not winning a game bloody faker couldn't and being the only one with a positive KDA.

*Sigh* sorry that dragged on a bit there, but it seems like these days its the cool and awesome thing to be a vile and dusgusting troll, hence sodapoppins popularity, and all the rest.

There is no sportsmanship in this game at all, even the stoicly silent pro's are more toxic than anyone else, they are just saying it outloud to a stream instead of typing it.

Swearing isn't punished. Fuck! Is fine Fuck you! Isn't. See the difference. 

Also we can't do anything to help without your logs. Without we just have your word you didn't deserve it.

Swearing is indeed punished, i can confirm from having been chat restricted due to very minor language-related offenses in the past, and having seen others restricted for the same reasons.

It seems to be weighted much less than hate speech, and less than personal attacks or insults, on top of the fact most players will not bother reporting it.

Permbans are never automatic, only restrictions and warnings.

You flamed your team pretty hard in that game.

As a tip, telling people to report someone is harassment/flaming and is punishable, since it serves no purpose except to tilt the player. I know kiddies will never believe the report system uses actual evidence (since it means accepting it is 100% their fault they got wrecked), but people are punished based on a review of their actions, not based on how many people report them.


TL;DR i used to be a salty noob (or whatever you are) like you, until i took a 24-game chat restriction to the face and decided to be more tolerant.
Only the one game?

> [{quoted}](name=EvilDustMan,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1dJz3Gd5,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2016-11-04T21:33:24.631+0000)
>
> Only the one game?

nah 2 more, but I couldnt drag my mouse to copy it from the game window and it took ages to write out, I'll do the other two tomorrow, its kinda late.

> [{quoted}](name=5v5 Teamfighter,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1dJz3Gd5,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-11-04T20:19:08.975+0000)
>
> your ban was well deserved honestly,
> you are the kid that none of us wants in our game.
> 
> stay banned kid.

Very forgiving, empathetic and understanding, thats not toxic at all, you aren't what is destroying the community at all.

"kid"  "stay banned kid"  Where is your humanity?

Re-read what you have said, I have, do you really think you are a good person? being so dismissive of someones account they have speant years of time and their hard earned money on?

And you can just write it off with a cold, soulless "stay banned kid" you're the type of person teabagging with masteries, and baiting people and getting others to gang up on one person.
Ignore him. He's currently banned and trolling the boards.

> [{quoted}](name=Hambone2013,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1dJz3Gd5,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2016-11-04T21:24:32.641+0000)
>
> Ignore him. He's currently banned and trolling the boards.

That 5v5 teamfighter guy?
If what you are saying is true, you really don't deserve this. You should post your chatlogs either way.

> [{quoted}](name=cFlake,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=1dJz3Gd5,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-11-04T19:35:55.888+0000)
>
> If what you are saying is true, you really don't deserve this. You should post your chatlogs either way.

At least you're somewhat reasonable, I don't think anyone deserves a PERMENANT ban, why not just 2 week bans over and over?

But I guess no one else is that forgiving, but yeah I don't think I deserved it either way, one of my chat logs down below.
